tooltip.simpleedits.chisel.shift_down: Some are Stone, Sandstone, Tuff, e.t.c
tooltip.simpleedits.wand.shift_down: Commands: /undo to reset, /block to set block type, /clearpos to clear positions
tooltip.simpleedits.waterdrainwand.shift: You have to use it on a block beside the water, not on the water itself!
tooltip.simpleedits.blockstatechanger.to: Change rotation, and positions of slabs and stairs!
tooltip.simpleedits.shapewand.tooltip: Creates shapes in a selection! /shape to see commands /radius to set radius
